New-York Historical Society
Herbert H. Lehman letter to Jacob Billikopf AHMC-Lehman, Herbert
0.01 Linear Feet in one folder
1929 November 8 Typed, signed letter from Herbert H. Lehman, on his stationery, to Jacob Billikopf at the Federation of Jewish Charities in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Lehman, then Lieutenant Governor-elect of New York, acknowledges Billikopf's "wonderful" friendship and expresses gratitude for his help in the election. Though not specific as to the nature of that help, Lehman considered it a valuable contribution to the vote in New York City and upstate. For more information and to request this item, see the catalog record, or write to manuscripts@nyhistory.org.
